name: adminMessageReceive
desc: Player receives messages sent to the admin channel

name: adminMessageSend
desc: Player may send messages to the admin channel

name: ban
desc: Player may ban other players with /ban

name: banlist
desc: Player may list active bans with /banlist

name: clientquery
desc: Player may issue /clientquery, available in version 2.4.3+.

name: date
desc: Player may query the date and time from the server with /date

name: flagMaster
desc: Player allowed to use all /flag commands

name: flagMod
desc: Player allowed to use /flag reset, /flag show and /flag history. Using /flag reset to reset an individual flag requires flagMaster

name: jitterwarn
desc: Player may use /jitterwarn and /jitterdrop' to query or set jitterwarn/jitterdrop variable

name: lagstats
desc: Player may use /lagstats to query the latency of players

name: lagwarn
desc: Player may use /lagwarn and /lagdrop to query or set lagwarn/lagdrop variable

name: listPerms
desc: Player may use /showperms to show the current permissions of the user/selected player.

name: packetlosswarn
desc: Player may use /packetlosswarn and /packetlossdrop to query or set packetlosswarn/packetlossdrop variable

name: plugins
desc: Player may use /listplugins, /loadplugin and /unloadplugin. Requires bzflag to be built with the optional plug-in support, available in version 2.0.10+.

name: privateMessage
desc: Player may send private messages with '.'

name: requireIdentify
desc: Registered callsigns must identify before they are allowed to spawn

name: setAll
desc: Grants all set* perms, allows use of /reload and /serverdebug

name: shortBan
desc: Allowed bans with limited durations only

name: showAdmin
desc: Gives a player an @ regardless of having the "shortban" or "ban" permission. The hideAdmin permission supersedes the showAdmin permission.

name: showOthers
desc: May use /showgroup and /showperms on other callsigns

name: spawn
desc: Join game as a player. Observers don't need this permission.
